details.detailsTitle: Celebrating 81 Years of Promoting Better Tax Policy
details.detailsDescription:
For 81 years, the Tax Foundation’s annual dinner has been an institution
for the tax community’s best, brightest, and most influential. Join us in
November of 2018 for our 80th annual Tax Prom, and find out why hundreds of
people say this is the tax world’s most celebrated event of the year.
